snippet: Jack Dorsey, the chief executive of both Twitter and Square, announced at a Twitter staff meeting that he would donate one-third of his stake in the company to the employee stock compensation pool.
lead_paragraph: Jack Dorsey, the chief executive of both Twitter and Square, announced at a Twitter staff meeting that he would donate one-third of his stake in the company to the employee stock compensation pool.

headline.print_headline: Twitter’s Chief Says He’ll Give Some of His Stock To Workers
headline.main: Twitter’s Chief Says He’ll Give Some of His Stock to Workers
